props.breaks: Convert '\n' in paragraphs into br tag.
props.langPrefix: CSS language prefix for fenced blocks. Can be useful for external highlighters.
props.noWrapper: Remove the wrapper element around the content.
props.quotes: Double + single quotes replacement pairs. When typographer enabled, and smartquotes on.
props.scope: Useful when you have multiple MarkdownIt components configured differently.
props.typographer: Enable some language-neutral replacement + quotes beautification.
props.xHtmlOut:
Use '/' to close single tags (
). This is only for full CommonMark compatibility.

events.onFrontMatterParsed: Event callback when front matter is parsed.
events.onTocParsed: Event callback when table of contents is parsed.
